subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ryan Briscoe won the pole position for the IndyCar series race at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, turning a lap average of 216.346 miles an hour in qualifying for Saturday night’s race.
snippet: Ryan Briscoe won the pole position for the IndyCar series race at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, turning a lap average of 216.346 miles an hour in qualifying for Saturday night’s race.
